name: Heroside
description:
a game about a woman learning to become her own person and not a stereotype known as Avery.

i also hope you are all ok with this game being added to some gamejams to help both out

Story: after being rescued by her boyfriend Blake from her kidnapper Dr.Zed, blake brings her home and has a talk to her about her fighting problems and tells her that she needs to learn that not all women are weak, Avery thinks while Blake Has To Get home. the next day a weird portal appears in Avery's Yard, the portal sucks her in and brings her to another world where she meets the goddess, Gyra, who say a ground known as the warrior 5 have been brainwashed by a body snatcher known as Shifter. Avery with no other choice agrees and goes after them to stop Shifter from destroying the world, but also save the warrior 5 from the brainwashing.

this game is coming out next month on the 3rd
